item.title: Quoting Sam Altman
item.description:
The cost to use a given level of AI falls about 10x every 12 months, and lower prices lead to much more use. You can see this in the token cost from GPT-4 in early 2023 to GPT-4o in mid-2024, where the price per token dropped about 150x in that time period. Moore‚Äôs law changed the world at 2x every 18 months; this is unbelievably stronger. ‚Äî Sam Altman, Three Observations

item.title: Using pip to install a Large Language Model that's under 100MB
item.description:
I just released llm-smollm2, a new plugin for LLM that bundles a quantized copy of the SmolLM2-135M-Instruct LLM inside of the Python package. This means you can now pip install a full LLM!

item.title: Quoting Benedict Evans
item.description: Part of the concept of ‚ÄòDisruption‚Äô is that important new technologies tend to be bad at the things that matter to the previous generation of technology, but they do something else important instead.
